name: Laggy Racing
description:
Chaotic racing game with bouncy cars and input lag.  Made for GMTK Jam 2020.

Use the WASD keys to try and wrangle control of your car.  The input lag makes this racing game much more challenging and frustrating!

If the web version is lagging make sure to try the download version, as it will have a higher framerate.

Featuring:

  • 8 unique AI controlled cars
  • 3 racetracks
  • Frustrating, laggy controls and unpredictable physics
  • Sound effects from SoundBible used under Attribution 3 license
